languages.text: "А я буду стоять подле тебя в этот момент, чемпион. Вера да будет непоколебима в сердцах праведных".
"And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
languages.original_text: "А я буду стоять подле тебя в этот момент, чемпион. Вера да будет непоколебима в сердцах праведных".

traits.locale_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
"And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
"And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
"And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
"And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

languages.text: « Et je me tiendrai à vos côtés le moment venu, {mf|champion|championne}. Puisse la foi des dévots ne jamais faiblir. »
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

traits.locale_text: « Et je me tiendrai à vos côtés le moment venu, {mf|champion|championne}. Puisse la foi des dévots ne jamais faiblir. »

languages.text: «Y estaré a tu lado cuando lo hagas, campe{mf|ón|ona}. Que la fe de los corazones devotos nunca flaquee».
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

traits.locale_text: «Y estaré a tu lado cuando lo hagas, campe{mf|ón|ona}. Que la fe de los corazones devotos nunca flaquee».

languages.text: 「その時は、私はお前の側に立とう、英雄よ。敬虔なる人々の心の中にある信仰が揺らがんことを」
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

traits.locale_text: 「その時は、私はお前の側に立とう、英雄よ。敬虔なる人々の心の中にある信仰が揺らがんことを」

languages.text: “当你踏上旅途的时候，我会与你同在，勇士。愿虔诚之人的信仰永不动摇。”
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

traits.locale_text: “当你踏上旅途的时候，我会与你同在，勇士。愿虔诚之人的信仰永不动摇。”

languages.text: "Und ich werde an Eurer Seite stehen, wenn es soweit ist, Champion. Möge der Glaube in den Herzen der Gläubigen niemals wanken."
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde an Eurer Seite stehen, wenn es soweit ist, Champion. Möge der Glaube in den Herzen der Gläubigen niemals wanken."

languages.text: "Bu sırada ben de yanında olacağım müdafi. Kendilerini adamışların kalplerindeki inanç asla sarsılmasın."
languages.original_text: "And I will stand at your side when you do, champion. May the faith in the hearts of the devout never waver."
